phrases.phrase: <title>Forum User Time Stamp</title><info>Forum User Time Stamp</info>
<title>Total Posts Per Thread</title><info>Total Posts Per Thread</info>
Can add a new public forum?
Can manage forum moderators? Notice: Includes adding, editing and deleting forum moderators.
Can reply on threads posted by other users?
Enable Captcha protection when posting within the forums?
<title>Total Tag Display</title><info>Define how many tags should be displayed within the tag cloud for the forum.</info>
<title>Total Forum Post Preview</title><info>Define how many posts can be previewed when adding a new reply to a thread.</info>
Define how many minutes this user group should wait before they can post a new thread. Note: Set to 0 if there should be no limit.

Define how many minutes this user group should wait before they can post a new reply to a thread.
Note: Set to 0 if there should be no limit.
List of the latest topics from our public forum.
Set to True to enable RSS feeds for each forum.
Set to True to enable RSS feeds on threads.
Points received when adding a thread/post within the forum.
Only members can add a reply to threads.
Insufficient permission to reply to this thread.
Posting a reply a little too soon.
You are not permitted to move this thread to this specific forum.
You are not permitted to copy this thread to this specific forum.
Not allowed to merge threads from this specific forum.
Provide a name for your forum.
Insufficient permission to edit this thread.
Provide a title for your thread.
Posting a new thread a little too soon.
RSS feeds are disabled for threads.
{full_name} vừa mới trả lời trong topic "{title}". Để xem thread này, hãy nhấn vào liên kết sau: {link}
Not a valid forum URL. Missing forum path.
Not a valid forum URL. Missing thread ID.
Not a valid forum URL. Thread is not valid.
Not a valid forum URL. Merging thread is not valid.
You cannot merge the same thread.
You cannot merge this thread as it belongs to another group/forum.
Select a forum this announcement will belong to.
{full_name} trả lời trong thread "{title}".

Are you sure?
Notice! This will delete all child forums and any threads, posts, announcements that belong to those forums.
This cannot be undone.
Múi giờ GMT{time_zone}. Bây giờ là {current_time}.
Announcement will be included in child forums.
This thread has more than {total_setting} replies. Click here to review the whole thread.
{full_name} trả lời trong thread "{title}".
Can browse and view the forum module?
Can members of this user group mark a thread as sponsored?
You are not allowed to mark threads as sponsor.
Can members of this user group purchase a sponsored ad space?
How much is the sponsor space worth for forum threads? This works in a CPM basis.
That thread is no longer available

After the user has purchased a sponsored space, should the thread be published right away? If set to false, the admin will have to approve each new purchased sponsored thread space before it is shown in the site.
<title>Forum Global Time Stamp</title><info>This is the time stamp that is displayed at the bottom of the forum.</info>
Approve threads before they are displayed publicly?
Your thread "{thread_title}" on {site_title} has been approved. To view your thread follow the link below: {link}
Approve forum posts before they are displayed publicly?
Your post has successfully been added, however it is pending an Admins approval before it can be displayed publicly.
Your post that is part of the forum thread "{thread_title}" on {site_title} has been approved. To view your post follow the link below: {link}

<title>Database Tracking</title><info>If this option is enabled it will track users by storing the threads they have viewed in the database. As opposed to storing recent threads in cookies and basing if a user has viewed a thread or not on several time stamps. With this feature enabled it is much more accurate, however it requires extra server resources and on large forums it is best to disable this feature.</info>

After the user has purchased a sponsored space, should the thread be published right away? If set to false, the admin will have to approve each new purchased sponsored thread before it is shown in the site.
You have already given your thanks for this post.
Can delete "thanks" added by other users?
The "Thank You" you are trying to delete cannot be found.
You do not have the proper permissions to delete this "Thank You".
You do not have the proper permission to view this thread.
Select a user group to assign special permissions for this specific forum.
Can attach polls to forum threads?
The following users say Thank You to {full_name} for this useful post
{full_name} liked one of your forum posts
{full_name} liked your one of your forum posts in the thread "{title}>/a>" To view this post follow the link below: {link}
{users} liked {gender} own forum post in the thread "{title}"
{users} liked {row_full_name}'s forum post in the thread "{title}"
Unable to view this item due to privacy settings.
Please log in to view this thread.
